<h3 class="title">Using the Spell Checking Plugin</h3>


<table id="insTable">
<tbody><tr><td colspan="2"><span class="highlight">6. Create a new "Writer document".</span></td></tr>
<tr><td colspan="2"><img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/006_new_document.png"></td></tr>

<tr><td colspan="2"><span class="highlight">7. Write a text and select it.</span></td></tr>
<tr><td colspan="2"><img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/007_write_select.png"></td></tr>

<tr><td colspan="2"><h4 class="title">If you are using Windows follow steps 8-9 and skip step 10 otherwise go to step 10.</h4></td></tr>
<tr><td><span class="highlight">8. Go to the bottom of the application and click on the language option.</span></td><td><span class="highlight">9. Select the "More ..." option.</span></td></tr>
<tr><td><img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/008_language_clic.png"></td><td><img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/009_more_language.png"></td></tr>

<tr><td colspan="2"><h4 class="title">If you are not using Windows:</h4></td></tr>
<tr><td colspan="2"><span class="highlight">10. Go to the application menu and click on Tools-&gt;Language-&gt;For Selection-&gt;More... option.</span></td></tr>
<tr><td colspan="2"><img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/013_menu_language.png"></td></tr>


<tr><td colspan="2"><span class="highlight">11. Select "Quechua (Bolivia - South)" from the language combobox.</span></td></tr>
<tr><td colspan="2"><img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/010_select_language.png"></td></tr>

<tr><td colspan="2"><img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/011_select_language_ok.png"></td></tr>

<tr><td rowspan="2"><span class="highlight">13. Right-click on a word to get a list of suggested corrections (none if the word is correctly spelled).</span></td><td rowspan="2"><img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/012_right_clic.png"></td></tr>
